name: Monster Girl Fantasy 2: Exposed
description:
The girls from Monster Girl Fantasy are back and they have brought new friends with them! You have a mission to accomplish but there are forces trying to divert your attention. Who can you trust when everything is laid bare?Key FeaturesSeduce or be seduced! The monster girls are revealing it all!
Exotic fantasy world filled with unique creatures and monster girls
New and improved progression system with lots of room for customization through skills, spells & items
Full enjoyable experience in native English!
